nodes.text: This Aing-Tii translation device was created by the Aing-Tii species for help with communicating with other species, since the Aing-Tii communicated through the use of pheromones. This electronic translator could analyze the pheromones produced by an Aing-Tii and translate them into words in basic, and vice-versa. Tadar'Ro's personal translation device was programmed with the voice of Jorj Car'das.
